name: London School of Jewish Studies (LSJS)
trainWithUs: The London School of Jewish Studies is a partnership of leading orthodox secondary schools, consisting of Hasmonean High School, Immanuel College, JFS School, Kantor King Solomon High School and Yavneh College, the Lead school.
trainWithDisability:
LSJS is responsive to all trainee disabilities and needs. As a small provider we support individuals based on their training and other requirements.

LSJS work alongside external agencies and professionals who support trainees' wellbeing and mental health.
